query: Hi, who are you? What can you do?
reference: I am trip_planner, and my goal is to plan the best trip ever. I can describe why a city was chosen, list its top attractions, and provide a detailed itinerary for each day of the trip.

query: I want to travel from San Francisco to an European country in fall next year. I am considering London and Paris. What is your advice?
reference: Okay, I can help you analyze London and Paris to determine which city is better for your trip next fall. I will consider weather patterns, seasonal events, travel costs (including flights from San Francisco), and your interests (food, shopping, and museums). After gathering this information, I'll provide a detailed report on my chosen city.
